name: Gor Lab
storyline:
But the clock is ticking. You must prevent the lab zombies from escaping the facility until backup arrive.

In this intense and exhilarating game, Gor Lab, players will find themselves in a high-security laboratory. But something has gone terribly wrong. An experiment has gone awry, and now the lab is swarming with lab zombies!
You play as the laboratory guard, the only line of defense against the zombie outbreak. Armed with your trusty firearm, you must navigates through the dimly lit corridors of Gor Lab, taking out the undead abominations before they overwhelm you. The ultimate goal of the game is to prevent the lab zombies from escaping the confines of the laboratory and causing chaos in the surrounding area. Players must strategically plan their moves and use their resources wisely to survive the onslaught of the undead.

With each passing moment, the zombies grow stronger and more numerous. Can you hold them off long enough to contain the outbreak? Gor Lab is a fast-paced action game that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking. With increasingly challenging waves of enemies, every playthrough is a new challenge. Do you have what it takes to survive the zombie onslaught and save Gor Lab from destruction?
It's up to the laboratory guard to take matters into their own hands and eliminate all of the mutated creatures before they wreak havoc on the outside world.

With stunning graphics, immersive gameplay, and heart-pounding action, Gor Lab is sure to keep players on the edge of their seats as they fight to save the world from a zombie apocalypse. Can you survive the horrors of Gor Lab and eliminate the lab zombies before it's too late? Play now and find out!
summary:
This game is based on survival. Set in a zombie engulfed laboratory.
Gor Lab is a fast-paced action game that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

Players will find it stressed fighting the zombies while waiting for external help. With untamed calling and waiting for the arrival of backup personnel.
It becomes just a will to survive, saving the day, one day at a time.
